      • ensureAll

        public static java.util.Set<javax.management.ObjectName> ensureAll(java.lang.String... expectedNames)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Ensure that all of the specified names are registered. Note that these are components of the name, and in particular order matters - you want the more specific name (leafs) specified before their parent(s) (since names are hierarchical) It waits in a loop up to 60 seconds before failing if there is a mismatch.
        Parameters:
        expectedNames -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.management.MalformedObjectNameException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

                                                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        Ensure that only the specified names are registered. Note that these are components of the name, and in particular order matters - you want the more specific name (leafs) specified before their parent(s) (since names are hierarchical)
        Parameters:
        expectedNames -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.management.MalformedObjectNameException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • ensureParent

        public static java.util.Set<javax.management.ObjectName> ensureParent(java.lang.String... expectedNames)
                                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        Ensure that the specified parent names are registered. Note that these are components of the name. It waits in a loop up to 60 seconds before failing if there is a mismatch. This will return the beans which are not matched. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ZOOKEEPER-1858
        Parameters:
        expectedNames - - expected beans
        Returns:
        the beans which are not matched with the given expected names
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
